original_text: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness, and in the bond of iniquity.
korean_text: 내가 보니 너는 악독이 가득하며 불의에 매인 바 되었도다

sentences.original_text: that thou art in the gall of bitterness
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 쓴 쓴 소독 속에 있구나

sentences.original_text: and in the bond of iniquity
